titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Kings Most Excellent Maiestie in the Church of Beauly in Hampshire, the thirtieth of Iuly. M.DC.IX. By Christopher Hampton, Doctor in Diuinitie, and one of his Ma[jes]ties chapleines.
titleStmt.author: Hampton, Christopher, 1552-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the Societie of Stationers, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "An addition to the former treatise of soueraignetie" has separate, undated, title page.
Reproduction of the original in Dr. Williams's Library.
